description: A framework for managing and maintaining multi-language pre-commit hooks.

options.description: show this help message and exit
show program's version number and exit

subcommands.name: autoupdate
subcommands.description: Auto-update pre-commit config to the latest repos' versions.

subcommands.name: init-templatedir
subcommands.description: Install hook script in a directory intended for use with `git config init.templateDir`.

subcommands.name: install-hooks
subcommands.description: Install hook environments for all environments in the config file.

subcommands.name: migrate-config
subcommands.description: Migrate list configuration to new map configuration.

subcommands.name: try-repo
subcommands.description: Try the hooks in a repository, useful for developing new hooks.

subcommands.name: help
subcommands.description: Show help for a specific command.
